slides.title: Class of 2025 Graduate
slides.description: Here's a photo of me at my graduation where I received my Master's degree in Computer Science from Michigan State University.

slides.title: MSU Teaching Assistant
slides.description: During my time at MSU, I was a TA for CSE 335: Object-Oriented Software Design (C++) and CSE 477: Web Development (JavaScript).

slides.title: Team Techsmith Capstone Project
slides.description: My senior capstone team won an award for our project. Our application allows users to upload and edit video files through text commands alone.

slides.title: AI Engineer Internship
slides.description: In the summer of 2024, I was an intern at ZF. I developed an information retrieval platform for the Continuous Improvement System.
